item.title: How R and Python Work Together
item.description: Acomplishing the Same Goals With Different Languages Say you want to analyze a particular dataset using R Studio. For example, lets find how many variables and observations are in the 'quakes' dataset and lets find the minimum, maximum, mean, and median values for the variable mag using R Studio nrow(quakes) ## [1] 1000 ncol(quakes) ## [1] 5 min(quakes$mag) ## [1] 4 max(quakes$mag) ## [1] 6.4 mean(quakes$mag) ## [1] 4.
